rtega_mnemonic:
萬萬RSten thousand, innumerable
  • only the rump 禸 of a scorpion is visible in the grass 艹 in the fields 田: the tail of the scorpion consists of innumerable segments

  • those innumerable stupid 禺 weeds 艹 which keep sprouting among the crops

purpleculture_examples:
萬一 [ wàn yī ]: just in case; if by any chance; contingency
萬物 [ wàn wù ]: all living things
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 禺 [ yú ] district; mountain in Zhejiang
heisig_chinese_memo: This is the old ten thousand yen bill in Japan - Jiminy Cricket surrounded by a wreath of flowers on the front. It's uncommon to see nowadays since it was only in print for a few days immediately after the war as a temporary solution. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese:
wàn: (число) десять тысяч; огромное количество, множество
wàn: (нареч) во что бы то ни стало, абсолютно, чрезвычайно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the long-tailed monkeys (禺) are in the grass (艹) - 10,000 of them!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I bound up ten thousand dollars and hid it under the floor.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (萬, 万, wan, ten thousand) is the shape of scorpion . The tail of this character shows a hook with three swords (trident): (九, jiu, nine). In ancient times, people often ate large numbers of scorpions that they cooked, skewered on a stick. Now it means the number 10,000. This could be also due to scorpion’s characteristics of living in groups and laying many eggs.
humanum_full_description_en:
Single-type characters, the characters are like scorpions. The original meaning of suspicion is scorpion, which is later borrowed as a numeral, and ten thousand is ten thousand. After long-term borrowing and not repaying , he made another word for "虿". "Shuowen": "Ten thousand, insects. Congsuo, pictogram." Duan Yucai's note: "The name of insects is also called tens of thousands of names, and tens of thousands have no orthographic characters. So the falsehood for a long time does not return, scholars ignorant of Qi The original meaning is." However, the ancient meaning of the character " 10,000 " actually left traces in the accumulating character of "虿". " Yu " is actually a certain kind of scorpion. It is very likely that the " 10,000 " character has been borrowed for a long time, and the note " worm " was added to the original 4D character. "Three Kingdoms‧Volume 29‧Wei Shu‧Fang Ji Biography‧Hua Tuo Biography" has: "Mrs. Pengcheng's toilet at night, sting her hand" is enough to prove.

"Ten Thousand " inscriptions and the Warring States period may be added from " tu ", refer to Lu Gongzhong and "Shangbo Zhushu I." Jian Yi in figure 8 Qin Dynasty official script " Wan upper clamp in the shape of words like scorpions" gradually falsely as " Cottage " shape for the future generations Cheng Kai Li.

The Oracle " Wan " is used as a numeral, "He Ji" 21651: "Ten thousand people return." It is also used as a place name, "He Ji" 9812: "Wan Shou Nian", which refers to the good years of Wandi's harvest. "Collection" 20253: "Wang Hu (call) Wanjieshi", refers to the king's command of Wandi's army on guard.

The inscription " ten thousand " is also used as a numeral, Yuding: "Fu (captive) people are three thousand and eighty-one people." It can also refer to infinite, hanging Jiding: "It is used by thousands of descendants and grandchildren." The term "wanmin" refers to the people of the world, and Jin Jiangding: "I am all the people" refers to the people who govern me. "poetry. Daya. "Yi": "The children and grandchildren will not accept the ropes of the people." There is also the term "university", which means many countries, and Fangzun: "Ten thousand years will protect us." "Book. "Yao Dian": "Concord Wanbang."

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period also have the term "wanmin", referring to the people of the world. "Bao Yi" Jane 8: "One person celebrates again, and all people rely on it." It means that there is one person in the world who has good virtues and the people will rely on him. "Tsinghua Jane II. "Xian Nian" Jane 2: "Qing Li (Senior), Zhuzheng, Wanmin can bear the heart." In addition, the word is also used as " encouragement ", referring to encouragement, "Shangbo Zhushu II. "Rong Chengshi" Jane 43: "His politics is not rewarded, the official is not noble, and there is nothing (encouragement) to the people." The whole sentence means that he governs political affairs without rewards, and his ministers perform his duties without giving knighthoods, and there is no special encouragement to the people. . It is also used as " li ", referring to hard work, "Guodian Jian. "Xing Ziming Out" Jane 10: "Anything is moving, or meeting it, or accommodating it, or Wan (li)", which refers to the nature of all things, or inspires it, or welcomes it, or cooperates with it, or insults it.

In addition, it should be noted that the " wan " in today's simplified characters is actually an extremely old character. It originally referred to a musician who played a certain musical instrument. Later, it was also used as tens of thousands because of its close sound. See " ten thousand ".
humanum_short_description_en: Single-type characters, the characters resemble scorpions. The original meaning of suspicion is scorpion, which is later borrowed as a numeral, and ten thousand is ten thousand. After long-term borrowing and not repaying , he made another word for "虿".
humanum_full_description:
獨體字，字象蝎子之形。疑本義為蝎子，後借用為數詞，十千為萬。久借不還，遂另做「蠆」字。《說文》：「萬，蟲也。从厹，象形。」段玉裁注︰「謂蟲名也。假借為十千數名，而十千無正字。遂久假不歸，學者昧其本義矣。」不過，「萬」字的古義，其實還於「蠆」這個累增字中留下了痕跡。「蠆」其實也解作某一種蝎子，很有可能是「萬」字被久借不還用後，自原來的萬字下加注意符「虫」的結果。《三國志‧卷二十九‧魏書‧方技傳‧華佗傳》便有：「彭城夫人夜之廁，蠆螫其手」一語，足以為證。

　　「萬」字金文與戰國文字或加從「土」，參邾公鐘與《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡8字形。秦代隸書「萬」字上部象蝎子鉗之形漸訛為「艸」形，為後世楷隸所承。

　　甲骨文「萬」用作數詞，《合集》21651：「萬人歸。」又用作地名，《合集》9812：「萬受年」，指萬地得到了豐收的好年成。《合集》20253：「王乎(呼)萬戒師」，指王命令萬地的軍隊戒備。

　　金文「萬」亦用作數詞，盂鼎：「孚(俘)人萬三千八十一人。」又可泛指無限，弔姬鼎：「其萬子孫永寶用。」金文中常見「萬民」一詞，意指天下人民，晉姜鼎：「乂我萬民」，指治理我的百姓。《詩．大雅．抑》：「子孫繩繩，萬民靡不承。」另又有「萬邦」一詞，意指眾多邦國，盠方尊：「萬年保我萬邦。」《書．堯典》：「協和萬邦。」

　　戰國竹簡亦有「萬民」一詞，指天下人民，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡8：「一人又(有)慶，萬民賴之」，指天下有一人有善德，人民都會依賴他。《清華簡二．繫年》簡2：「卿李(士)、諸正、萬民弗忍于厥心。」另，字又用作「勵」，指鼓勵，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡43：「其政治而不賞，官而不爵，無萬(勵)於民。」全句指他治理政事而不用獎賞，臣下盡職而不賜爵位，對人民沒有特別鼓勵。又用作「厲」，指砥礪，《郭店簡．性自命出》簡10：「凡性或動之，或逢之，或交之，或萬(厲)之」，指大凡是本性，或興動它，或逢迎它，或配合它，或砥礪它。

　　此外，應注意今日簡體字中的「万」，其實也是一極古老的字，本指演奏某一種樂器的樂師，後亦因音近而被假借為萬千的萬。參見「万」。
humanum_short_description: 獨體字，字象蝎子之形。疑本義為蝎子，後借用為數詞，十千為萬。久借不還，遂另做「蠆」字。

Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 一
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 禺 [ yú ] district; mountain in Zhejiang
①數目，十個一千：萬戶侯(中國漢代侯爵的最高一級，享有萬戶農民的賦稅。後泛指高官)。
②喻極多：萬物。萬方(a。指全國和世界各地；b。指姿態多種多樣)。日理萬機。氣象萬千。
③極，很，絕對：萬萬。萬幸。
④姓氏。

萬物 [ wàn wù ]: all living things

Chinese: This is the old ten thousand yen bill in Japan - Jiminy Cricket surrounded by a wreath of flowers on the front. It's uncommon to see nowadays since it was only in print for a few days immediately after the war as a temporary solution.  
Meaning: ten thousand
Hanzi: 万
Story: I bound up ten thousand dollars and hid it under the floor.
Kind: traditional

獨體字，字象蝎子之形。疑本義為蝎子，後借用為數詞，十千為萬。久借不還，遂另做「 蠆 」字。《說文》：「萬，蟲也。从厹，象形。」段玉裁注︰「謂蟲名也。假借為十千數名，而十千無正字。遂久假不歸，學者昧其本義矣。」不過，「 萬 」字的古義，其實還於「 蠆 」這個累增字中留下了痕跡。「 蠆 」其實也解作某一種蝎子，很有可能是「 萬 」字被久借不還用後，自原來的萬字下加注意符「 虫 」的結果。《三國志‧卷二十九‧魏書‧方技傳‧華佗傳》便有：「彭城夫人夜之廁，蠆螫其手」一語，足以為證。 「 萬 」字金文與戰國文字或加從「 土 」，參邾公鐘與《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡8字形。秦代隸書「 萬 」字上部象蝎子鉗之形漸訛為「 艸 」形，為後世楷隸所承。 甲骨文「 萬 」用作數詞，《合集》21651：「萬人歸。」又用作地名，《合集》9812：「萬受年」，指萬地得到了豐收的好年成。《合集》20253：「王乎(呼)萬戒師」，指王命令萬地的軍隊戒備。 金文「 萬 」亦用作數詞，盂鼎：「孚(俘)人萬三千八十一人。」又可泛指無限，弔姬鼎：「其萬子孫永寶用。」金文中常見「萬民」一詞，意指天下人民，晉姜鼎：「乂我萬民」，指治理我的百姓。《詩．大雅．抑》：「子孫繩繩，萬民靡不承。」另又有「萬邦」一詞，意指眾多邦國，盠方尊：「萬年保我萬邦。」《書．堯典》：「協和萬邦。」 戰國竹簡亦有「萬民」一詞，指天下人民，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡8：「一人又(有)慶，萬民賴之」，指天下有一人有善德，人民都會依賴他。《清華簡二．繫年》簡2：「卿李(士)、諸正、萬民弗忍于厥心。」另，字又用作「 勵 」，指鼓勵，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡43：「其政治而不賞，官而不爵，無萬(勵)於民。」全句指他治理政事而不用獎賞，臣下盡職而不賜爵位，對人民沒有特別鼓勵。又用作「 厲 」，指砥礪，《郭店簡．性自命出》簡10：「凡性或動之，或逢之，或交之，或萬(厲)之」，指大凡是本性，或興動它，或逢迎它，或配合它，或砥礪它。 此外，應注意今日簡體字中的「 万 」，其實也是一極古老的字，本指演奏某一種樂器的樂師，後亦因音近而被假借為萬千的萬。參見「 万 」。

萬字的基本解释

萬
wàn
见“万”。

萬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wàn］
［《廣韻》無販切，去願，微。］
(1)数词。千的十倍。
(2)极言其多。
(3)指使变成极多。
(4)绝对；一定。
(5)舞名。
(6)指跳《万》舞。
(7)极言各不相同。
(8)姓。

萬字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1042第33
〔古文〕㸘??【唐韻】無販切，音蔓。【說文】蟲也。【埤雅】蜂一名萬。蓋蜂類衆多，動以萬計。　又數名。【易·乾象】萬國咸寧。【前漢·律歷志】紀于一，協于十，長于百，大于千，衍于萬。　又舞名。【詩·邶風】方將萬舞。【疏】萬者，舞之總名。【大戴禮·夏小正】萬也者，干戚舞也。【韻會】湯武以萬人得天下，故干舞稱萬舞。　又州名。【寰宇記】漢巴東郡，後唐貞觀曰萬州。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】萬氏，孟子門人萬章。　又【韻補】入銑韻。【白居易·寄元九詩】憐君爲謫吏，窮薄家貧褊。三寄衣食資，數盈二十萬。　【六書正譌】或省作万，非。

萬字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
萬字的起名意思

Million
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wàn］
["Guangyun" no sales cut, go to wish, micro. ]
(1) Numerals. Ten times a thousand.
(2) Exactly.
(3) There are extremely many instructions.
(4) Absolutely; definitely.
(5) Dance name.
(6) Refers to dancing the "10,000" dance.
(7) Extremely different.
(8) Last name.
Million
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　万; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1042 Page 33
〔古文〕㸘??【Tang Yun】No sales cut, sound vine. [Said the text] Worms too. [Piya] A bee is one million. There are many bees that move tens of thousands.　Also several names. [Yi·Qianxiang] Xianning of the World. [Previous Han·Lüzhi] Ji Yuyi, synergizes in ten, is longer than a hundred, is greater than a thousand, and derives from ten thousand.　Also known as the dance name. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Fang Jiang Wanwu. [Sparse] Wanzhe, the general name of dance. 【Da Dai Li·Xia Xiaozheng】Thousands of people, do Qi Wu. [Rhyme Club] Tang Wu wins the world with ten thousand people, so dry dance is called ten thousand dances.　Also the name of the state. [Han Yu Ji] Han Badong County, after Tang Zhen Guan said Wanzhou.　Another last name. 【Tongzhi·Clan Profile】Wan, a member of the Mencius family, Wanzhang.　【Rhyme Filling】Enter the milling rhyme again. [Bai Juyi·Jiyuan Nine Poems] Pity the monarch is a banal official, and his family is poor. Three send food and clothing, the number of surplus is 200,000.　【Six Books Zhengzheng】Or save for ten thousand, no.
